thread.title: Alstom and H&M rise as European shares climb higher
thread.title_full: Alstom and H&M rise as European shares climb higher

title: Alstom and H&M rise as European shares climb higher
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Aug 17, 2015, 10:41 BST - UK Markets close in 5 hrs 49 mins Alstom and H&M rise as European shares climb higher Reuters - UK Focus – 2 hours 29 minutes ago 6.57 -0.140 
LONDON, Aug 17 (Reuters) - European stocks rose on Monday to rebound from losses last week caused by worries over China's currency devaluation, with shares in French industrial group Alstom (Paris: FR0010220475 - news ) outperforming. 
The pan-European FTSEurofirst 300 index was up by 0.9 percent while the euro zone's blue-chip Euro STOXX 50 index also moved 1 percent higher. 
Alstom shares rose around 7 percent, after two people familiar with the matter told Reuters that General Electric was expected to secure EU approval for its proposed 12.4-billion-euro ($13.8 billion) bid for Alstom's power business. 
Shares (Berlin: DI6.BE - news ) in Hennes & Mauritz also advanced by 2.4 percent after the fashion retailer reported higher sales. (Reporting by Sudip Kar-Gupta; Editing by Alistair Smout) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
